MASTER_PAD_VERSION_INFO.MASTER_PAD_INFO: Portable Application Description, or PAD for short, is a data set that is used by shareware authors to disseminate information to anyone interested in their software products. To find out more go to http://www.asp-shareware.org/pad

Program_Info.Program_OS_Support: Java,Linux,Linux Gnome,Linux GPL,Linux Open Source,Mac OS X,Unix,Win2000,Win7 x32,Win7 x64,Win98,WinOther,WinVista,WinVista x64,WinXP

English.Char_Desc_45: Jajuk is a powerful music organizer
English.Char_Desc_80: Jajuk is a powerful music organizer for all platforms
English.Char_Desc_250: Jajuk is a powerful music organizer for all platforms. The main goal of this project is to provide a fully-featured application to advanced users with large or scattered music collections.
English.Char_Desc_450: Jajuk is a powerful music organizer for all platforms. The main goal of this project is to provide a fully-featured application to advanced users with large or scattered music collections. Jajuk main principles are maximum features, maximum portability and maximum usability
English.Char_Desc_2000: Jajuk is a powerful music organizer for all platforms. The main goal of this project is to provide a fully-featured application to advanced users with large or scattered music collections. Jajuk is a Free Software published under GPL license. Jajuk main principles are maximum features, maximum portability and maximum usability.
